mapper.select: select * from (select n.*, rownum as rnum from (select * from vwAttractionList) n) where rnum between #{startIndex} and #{endIndex}
select * from vwLocation where lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblAttraction (attraction_seq, name, info, capacity, time, restriction) VALUES (seqtblAttraction.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{info}, #{capacity}, '10:00 - 22:00', #{restriction})
mapper.select: select max(attraction_seq) as attraction_seq from tblAttraction
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblAttractionLocation (attraction_location_seq, lat, lng, attraction_seq) VALUES (seqAttractionLocation.nextVal, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{attraction_seq})
INSERT INTO tblAttractionImg (attraction_img_seq, img, attraction_seq) VALUES (seqtblAttractionImg.NEXTVAL, #{img}, #{attraction_seq})
